description: This course is designed to assist students in developing their own teacher style as they
prepare to become full-time teachers. Topics include the roles and responsibilities of
teachers, methods of instruction, planning, classroom management, assessment and
reporting and other current educational issues. Through micro-teaching and school-based
field experiences, they also practice instructional skills and techniques. Required
